isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ENGINE COOLANT LEVEL SYSTEM (ENGINE PROTECTION) - FLASH CODE 323 - PID 111 FMI 1 - ECM: ENGINE COOLANT BELOW WARNING/ CRITICAL LEVEL

svcproc.title: FLASH CODE 323 - PID 111 FMI 1 - ECM: ENGINE COOLANT BELOW WARNING/ CRITICAL LEVEL
svcproc.para: Flash Code 323 will be active when a low coolant situation is present and the Prolink will indicate COOLANT LOW. After the coolant has been restored to proper levels, Flash code 323 will remain as an inactive code and the ECM will log the engine hours of the occurrence.
